original_text: I will spread my net over him, and he shall be taken in my snare, and I will bring him to Babylon and enter into judgment with him there for the treachery he has committed against me.
korean_text: 그 위에 내 그물을 치며 내 올무에 걸리게 하여 끌고 바벨론으로 가서 나를 반역한 그 반역을 거기에서 심판할지며

sentences.original_text: I will spread my net over him
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 그물을 그 위에 펼치겠다

sentences.original_text: and he shall be taken in my snare
and I will bring him to Babylon
and enter into judgment with him there
for the treachery he has committed against me
